revised_title: Embryology of Monotremata and Marsupialia: Part I
tldr: The author conducted extensive research on the embryology and development of Monotremata and Marsupialia, focusing on Ornithorhynchus, Echidna, and Halmaturus rufus. They discovered unique reproductive and developmental characteristics of these species, including oviparous reproduction and meroblastic ovum, which challenged previous understanding of mammalian reproduction. The author also discussed the history of opinions on Monotremata and their classification.
